page.title: 01CHINGFORD
page.content: Chingford is a residential area in Waltham Forest.It is bordered by Epping Forest to the north and east and reservoirs to the west.Chingford used to be part of Essex but was incorporated into Waltham Forest in the nineteen sixties. There is a variety of housing in Chingford,privately owned or rented from the local authority.Chingford is linked to other areas by a British Rail electric line to Liverpool St Station in the City of London and several bus routes.It has some small shopping centres,parks,schools,clubs, libraries,churches and charity organisations as well as buildings of historic interest.In the summer Gilwell Pk is visited by scouts and French students.Chingford lies on the Greenwich Meridian.
